name: GiftCraft
description:
Wrap Presents, Save Christmas!

It's been a crazy, busy year! You've had so much pressure at work, your kids have been stressing you out all year and once again, you've left wrapping this year's Christmas presents to the last minute! 

In GiftCraft, save Christmas as you wrap your family's Christmas presents on Christmas morning, mere minutes before they come in to open them! Choose a gift box and cut it open with an opening tool, then add the appropriate gift, wrapping paper and ribbon depending on who the present is for! Combine different colours of paper and ribbon to meet your demanding recipients' desires! Can you do what it takes to save Christmas this year?! 

GiftCraft was created for the “Save Christmas” Jame Gam, December 2021. 

Controls: 

Fullscreen is recommended for the optimal play experience 

Mouse to click and drag items and decorations into gift boxes. 

Features: 

Vibrant and spirited 2D animated graphic setting and sprites 

Energetic, perky soundtrack with “Christmas Pop” inspired themes and comprehensive sound design 

Snappy dialogue from the cast of dynamic gift recipients 

Endless replayability as recipients demand different presents with each playthrough 

Tips and Tricks: 

Don't forget that you need to open boxes with the appropriate tools before attempting to stow items in them! 

Trying to find the basketball to send as a gift? Find the handwritten note and follow the instructions - throw it from the table into the Santa Hat! 

Need to make a new colour for the ribbon or wrapping paper? Try dragging and dropping different combinations of items into the Santa Hat and see what comes out! 

We hope you enjoy our game! 

Credits: 

oHoodie: Programmer and Designer 

Lifesteal: Art Director and Pixel Artist 

Ollie “OllieOnItch” McLoughlin: Composer and Audio Designer
